titleStmt.title: Abdias the prophet, interpreted by T.B. fellovv of Magdalene College in Oxforde. Seene and allowed according to the order appoynted
titleStmt.author: Brasbridge, Thomas, fl. 1590.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Binneman, for George Bishop,

Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
